answers.answer: Aw big boy!I'm glad all is well though. I know it stinks being so close yet so far away.Just keeping resting mama. Little one will be here in no time :)
Im hoping i pass the glucose test. she said as much as she wants to rule that out it is possible that i have gestational diabetes and thats why he is measuring big.
Well I hope that's not the case momma and all is well.
Thanks :) me too. at least i get another ultrasound lol :) get to se my baby again.
Yes that's always nice :) soon you will be holding him :)

question: Went in for my doctors appointment today. she checked my cervix cause if the cramping and pressure and its closed so all good there. then measured my belly and im 31+3 today and measured 33 weeks, so this wednesday i go in at 8am to 11 am to do the 3 hr glucose test then go back that same day at 1:40 for another ultrasound just to see how big my baby is.
title: ultrasound/3hr glucose test.
